enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve adding options to the Options instance, with addOptionGroup internally calling addOption for each option in the group.
Both methods involve adding options that may be required, though addRequiredOption directly sets the option as required.
After adding an option group, it may be necessary to verify the state of the group using getOptionGroup.
After adding an option group, it may be necessary to verify the list of required options to ensure the group's options are correctly marked as required.
